Key Match Events: Jarrett Allen was the team's leading scorer with 25 points and also dished out six assists
Evan Mobley poured in 18 points, 10 rebounds and seven assists
Dean Wade and Max Strus combined for 10 three-pointers
Shea Gilgeous-Alexander poured in 31 points for the Thunder
A late fourth-quarter run cut the Cavs' lead to two points with about 1:30 to play
Jarrett Allen's tip-out on an Evan Mobley missed three seemingly sealed the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers passed every test to this point in the season
They've set a record with a 32-4 start to the season
Some people doubted the Cavaliers' ability to perform in the Eastern Conference
The world was watching this game
